snippet: Café Royal, which opened in London more than a century ago and remained a sumptuous celebrity-studded destination for decades, is restored as a luxury hotel and restaurant.
abstract: Cafe Royal in London, once lavish gathering place for celebrities, reopens as hotel and restaurant designed by David Chipperfield with historic restoration work by Donald Insall Associates.
lead_paragraph: Café Royal, which opened in London more than a century ago and remained a sumptuous celebrity-studded destination for decades, is restored as a luxury hotel and restaurant.

headline.seo: Café Royal in London Reopens as a Hotel
headline.main: The Sun Rises Again on Café Royal
headline.print_headline: The Sun Rises Again on Café Royal
